displayProperties.name: Rapid Impacts
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with a Grenade Launcher temporarily increases the reload speed of Grenade Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Fell the Revenant
displayProperties.description:
Deal increased weapon damage to Scorn. 

Wearing Shadestalker Armor (currently {var:1903370001} of 4) increases the bonus damage.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Ether Generator
displayProperties.description:
Dark Ether Reaper origin trait has a chance to spawn an extra Dark Ether charge.

Weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait are overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Killing Breeze
displayProperties.description:
Rapid weapon final blows grant you a bonus to mobility.

Weapon final blows with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait count as more than one.

displayProperties.name: One with Frost
displayProperties.description: While Frost Armor is active, [Stasis] Stasis weapons gain increased reload speed and stability. Stasis Swords gain increased guard resistance.

displayProperties.name: Mobius Conduit
displayProperties.description: Activating Gathering Storm calls down lightning.

displayProperties.name: Bleak Domain
displayProperties.description: Bleak Watcher turrets are enhanced and grant icicle projectiles to weapons.

displayProperties.name: Sovereignty
displayProperties.description: Sovereignty

displayProperties.name: CQC Optics: High
displayProperties.description: Slightly increases zoom magnification.

displayProperties.name: Aerodynamics
displayProperties.description: Grants increased blast radius and projectile speed.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Surprising Gift
displayProperties.description: Adds a surprise gift appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Peppermint Burst
displayProperties.description: Adds a pepperminty appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Marksman Optics: Low
displayProperties.description: Slightly reduces zoom magnification.

displayProperties.description:

• Complete activities and defeat combatants for a chance to earn one of the following rewards.

POTENTIAL REWARDS

• World Energy Weapon

displayProperties.description:
POWER FROM PAIN
BOOST: Rapidly defeating weakened combatants spawns a Void breach.

displayProperties.description:
CONCUSSIVE RELOAD
BOOST: Using Grenade Launchers to damage bosses, Champions, or to break combatants' shields automatically reloads stowed weapons.

displayProperties.description: Firing a Rocket Launcher consumes one stack of Armor Charge, granting increased damage and reload speed until you reload or stow your Rocket Launcher.

displayProperties.description:
Tonic which grants the following effects for {var:535190580} minutes:

• Gain bonus Intellect.

Boosted Artifact Perks

VOID RENEWAL
BOOST: Picking up a Void Breach reloads Shotguns and Grenade Launchers.

OLD GOD'S RITE
BOOST: Create more seeking projectiles on final blow.

displayProperties.name: Dynamic Charge
displayProperties.description: Final blows and precision hits build up Dynamic Charge. Swapping to Arc Seeker mode increases damage and partially reloads the magazine based on the number of charges.

displayProperties.description:
Tonic which grants the following effects for {var:535190580} minutes:

• While amplified, Primary ammo Arc weapons deal bonus damage.

TRACE EVIDENCE
BOOST: Picking up an Ionic Trace grants an Armor Charge.

RETINAL BURN
BOOST: Blinding a target this way instead emits a blinding burst.

displayProperties.name: Overload Submachine Gun
displayProperties.description: Landing consecutive hits with any Submachine Gun you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Submachine Guns are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description: Aiming down the sights of a Pulse Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description: Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Shotgun
displayProperties.description: Shotguns you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Shotguns are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Breechloaded Grenade Launcher
displayProperties.description: Damaging a combatant with Primary or Special ammo Grenade Launchers disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Primary and Special ammo Grenade Launchers are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Ravenous Beast
displayProperties.description:
This weapon stores power when dealing or receiving damage.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Unleashes the beast when full, increasing outgoing damage and reducing incoming Solar damage.

displayProperties.name: tier1_mod1
displayProperties.description: tier1_mod1

displayProperties.name: tier1_mod2
displayProperties.description: tier1_mod2

displayProperties.name: tier1_mod3
displayProperties.description: tier1_mod3

displayProperties.name: tier1_mod4
displayProperties.description: tier1_mod4

displayProperties.name: Threat Remover
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with all pellets in a spread increases reload speed, handling, and stability.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of the Horn
displayProperties.description: Class abilities unleash a Solar blast.

displayProperties.name: Spirit of Alpha Lupi
displayProperties.description: Casting your class ability heals you and nearby allies.

displayProperties.name: Hearts of Ice
displayProperties.description: Winter's Wrath gives targets increased Shatter damage and buffs allies.

displayProperties.name: Glacial Guard
displayProperties.description: Stasis final blows and your class ability grant Frost Armor.

displayProperties.name: Dawning Surprise
displayProperties.description: Defeating targets awards a Dawning gift. Defeated powerful targets count as more than one.

displayProperties.name: Sentinel Shield
displayProperties.description:
[Super]  : Summon a shield of Void Light. 
While Sentinel Shield is active:
[Light Attack]  : Attack.
[Block]  : Block.
[Grenade]  : Perform a Shield Throw.

Guard with Sentinel Shield to create a defensive wall that draws hostile fire. Allies who shoot through the wall have increased weapon damage, and guarding allies makes the shield last longer.

displayProperties.name: The Roadborn
displayProperties.description: Precision final blows and rapid precision hits briefly grant bonus handling, range, rate of fire, and precision damage with this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Thin the Herd
displayProperties.description: Direct hits do increased damage to combatant shields and cause a volatile detonation. Dealing damage increases reload speed. Rapid final blows against grenade-damaged combatants refill the magazine.

displayProperties.name: Unbreakable
displayProperties.description:
[Grenade]  : Hold to summon a [Void] Void shield that draws hostile fire and blocks a portion of incoming damage, gradually draining your grenade energy and granting an overshield over time.

Releasing the grenade input or running out of energy releases a frontal blast from your shield that deals increased damage based on how much damage was blocked.

Combatants that come in contact with your shield are temporarily disoriented.

displayProperties.name: Adept Targeting
displayProperties.description: Greatly increases target acquisition.

displayProperties.name: Adept Counterbalance
displayProperties.description: Greatly improves recoil direction.

displayProperties.name: Ride the Bull
displayProperties.description: Final blows reload the magazine.
